title: Interprofessional Learning Module for Asthma Health Promotion: Collaborative Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of medicine/nursing/pharmacy and understanding of fundamental asthma concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where medical, nursing, and pharmacy students form mixed teams to conduct asthma health promotion activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain specialized knowledge about asthma management and prevention strategies with over 80% accuracy
Learners can execute role allocation and communication strategies through collaboration with peers from other disciplines
Learners can design and pilot an asthma education session for adolescents by applying the Triple A program

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Online Forum/Video Conferencing System)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
